results.title: Use AWF --enable-chroot mode and remove unnecessary --mount and --env flags
results.author: Copilot
results.impact_rationale: Major infrastructure improvement adopting AWF chroot mode across all engines; simplifies codebase significantly (net -461 lines); affects core workflow generation; fixes issue #13379; 158 files changed indicating thorough implementation
results.urgency_rationale: Created 16.1 hours ago (0.7 days); not draft (ready for review); 118 comments showing extensive engagement; 30 commits indicating iterative development; CI pending; fixes reported issue; architectural improvement with wide impact
results.quality_rationale: CI pending (mergeable_state: unknown); comprehensive PR description with implementation checklist and changesets; very large changeset but well-documented; extremely active discussion (118 comments); includes tests; fixes reported issue; iterative development (30 commits)
results.action_explanation: This is a critical infrastructure improvement that significantly simplifies the codebase while adopting AWF chroot mode. The PR has been actively developed with extensive discussion (118 comments, 30 commits), showing thorough iteration and collaboration. Despite the large scope and pending CI, the architectural benefits (net -461 lines), issue resolution (fixes #13379), and high engagement warrant fast-track review. The work quality is high with comprehensive documentation.
